page.title: 11AMENITIES 2 Travelling/shops
page.content: {The Butcher's Van:- The van comes over the Pennines from Kirby Steven to sell meat up and down the dale.They sell fresh meat and cooked meat as well as some fruit and vegetables. {The Fish van:-} The van usually comes up on a Thursday to sell wet fish, kippers and fish cakes. {The Fish and Chip van:-} The van comes over from Wensleydale on a Friday. It starts in Reeth and works it's way up the Dale as far as Gunnerside.It does especially well in the tourist season. {The Library van}:- There is a local authority service. The van comes up once a fortnight and stops in several well known places.
